QuestData.Title: Love Lost
QuestData.Description: Malfurion, my love...$b$bIn vision I saw him, enraged and then distressed, and now lost beyond my mind's reach.$b$b$R, I know we have little reason to trust one another, but I will not turn away your help.$b$bIf you value the sanctity of this world, you will come with me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Tyrande Whisperwind at Starsong Refuge.
